title: Valorisation of food waste with distinct carbon-to-nitrogen ratios by the microalga Isochrysis galbana: laboratory demonstration and techno-economic assessment
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01072H, Paper
Xu Zeng, Zhi-yuan Zhao, Gui-meng Wang, Derek M. Ayittey, Jia-le Zhu, Zhi-gang Zhou, Kin-chung Ho, Carol Sze Ki Lin, Zheng Sun
Valorization of food waste with varying C/N ratios through microalgal cultivation for the tailored production of high value-added products.
